import React from "react"; import { FaShieldAlt, FaLock, FaDatabase, FaUsers, } from "../../../utils/iconImport"; export const PrivacyPolicyContent: React.FC = () => { return ( <> {/* Introduction */}

Introduction

ChastityOS is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our application.

We understand the sensitive nature of the data you entrust to us and have implemented strict security measures to protect your privacy at all times.

{/* Data Collection */}

Data We Collect

Account Information

  • Email address for account authentication
  • Display name and profile information you provide
  • Account preferences and settings

Usage Data

  • Chastity session data (duration, start/end times)
  • Events and logs you create
  • Tasks and goals you set
  • Relationship data (with consent)
  • Analytics data to improve the service

Technical Data

  • Device information and browser type
  • IP address and location data (anonymized)
  • Performance and error logs
{/* Data Usage */}

How We Use Your Data

We use your data exclusively to provide and improve ChastityOS services:

  • Maintain your chastity tracking and session data
  • Enable communication with keyholders (when authorized)
  • Provide personalized achievements and goals
  • Send important notifications about your sessions
  • Improve app performance and user experience
  • Provide customer support when requested
{/* Data Security */}

Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

  • Encryption: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
  • Authentication: Secure login with optional two-factor authentication
  • Access Control: Strict access controls limit who can view your data
  • Regular Audits: We regularly review and update our security practices
  • Local Storage: Some data is stored locally on your device for offline access
{/* Data Sharing */}

Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.

We may share limited data only in these circumstances:

  • With your explicit consent (e.g., public profiles you choose to share)
  • With keyholders you authorize in relationship settings
  • To comply with legal obligations or court orders
  • To protect the rights and safety of our users
  • With service providers who help us operate the app (under strict confidentiality agreements)
{/* Your Rights */}

Your Rights

You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Access: Request a copy of your personal data
  • Correction: Update or correct your information
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
  • Portability: Export your data in a machine-readable format
  • Restriction: Limit how we process your data
  • Objection: Object to processing for marketing purposes

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@chastityos.com.

{/* Contact */}

Contact Us

If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact our privacy team:

Email: privacy@chastityos.com

Response Time: Within 48 hours

Data Protection Officer: Available upon request

{/* Changes to Policy */}

Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.

); };

/** * Relationships Page * Main page for managing keyholder relationships */ import React from "react"; import RelationshipManager from "@/components/relationships/RelationshipManager"; import { useRelationships } from "@/hooks/useRelationships"; const RelationshipsPage: React.FC = () => { const { needsMigration } = useRelationships(); return (
{/* Page header */}

Keyholder Relationships

Manage your connections with keyholders and submissives. Create relationships to share chastity tracking, tasks, and oversight.

{/* Relationship manager */} {/* Help section */}

How Relationships Work

For Submissives:

  • Send requests to keyholders
  • Share your chastity sessions and progress
  • Receive tasks and assignments
  • Get approval for session changes
  • Log events and milestones

For Keyholders:

  • Accept requests from submissives
  • Monitor their chastity progress
  • Create and approve tasks
  • Control session permissions
  • Set goals and requirements

Privacy & Security

All relationship data is encrypted and only visible to the participants. You can end relationships at any time, and your data remains under your control.

{needsMigration && (

Data Migration

We've detected existing chastity data. Use the migration feature above to convert your data to the new relationship system. This creates a self-managed profile that you can later share with a keyholder.

)}
); }; export default RelationshipsPage;
